description: List EKS clusters in the specified region

region.description: AWS region to query for EKS clusters

name: list_clusters

description: Get detailed information about a specific EKS cluster

cluster_name.description: Name of the EKS cluster to describe

region.description: AWS region where the cluster is located

name: describe_cluster

description: List node groups for a specific EKS cluster

region.description: AWS region where the cluster is located

name: list_node_groups

description: Get detailed information about a specific EKS node group

node_group_name.description: Name of the node group to describe

region.description: AWS region where the cluster is located

name: describe_node_group

description: Get logs from CloudWatch for a specific EKS resource

cluster_name.description: Name of the EKS cluster where the resource is located

end_time.description: End time in ISO format (defaults to now)

limit.description: Maximum number of log entries to return

minutes.description: Number of minutes to look back for logs

region.description: AWS region where the cluster is located

resource_name.description: Resource name to search for in log messages

resource_type.description: Resource type to search logs for

start_time.description: Start time in ISO format (overrides minutes parameter)

name: get_cloudwatch_logs

description: Get metrics from CloudWatch for a specific EKS resource

cluster_name.description: Name of the EKS cluster to get metrics for

dimensions.description: Dimensions to use for the CloudWatch metric query

end_time.description: End time in ISO format (defaults to now)

limit.description: Maximum number of data points to return

metric_name.description: Metric name to retrieve (e.g., cpu_usage_total, memory_rss)

minutes.description: Number of minutes to look back for metrics

namespace.description: CloudWatch namespace where the metric is stored

period.description: Period in seconds for the metric data points

region.description: AWS region where the cluster is located

start_time.description: Start time in ISO format (overrides minutes parameter)

stat.description: Statistic to use for the metric aggregation

name: get_cloudwatch_metrics

description: Search the EKS Troubleshoot Guide for troubleshooting information

query.description: Your specific question or issue description related to EKS troubleshooting

name: search_eks_troubleshoot_guide
